thread.title: Rob Kardashian Prays for Lamar Odom as Former NBA Star Remains in Critical Condition
thread.title_full: Rob Kardashian Prays for Lamar Odom as Former NBA Star Remains in Critical Condition

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Rob Kardashian Prays for Lamar Odom as Former NBA Star Remains in Critical Condition
text:
Comments Rob Kardashian shared a photo of him and Lamar on his Instagram page and said heartfelt prayer for the former NBA star who remains in critical condition. 
Rob Kardashian breaks his silence regarding Lamar Odom 's hospitalization. Rob, who used to spend time with Lamar when he was still married to Khloe Kardashian , took to Instagram to send prayer for the former basketball star who still remains in critical condition. "Praying nonstop for my brother !!" the 28-year-old reality star captioned a throwback photo of him and Lamar hugging. In the meantime, Kendall Jenner has been snapped flocking to Lamar's side at the Sunrise Hospital in Nevada on Wednesday, October 14. The 19-year-old model was spotted arriving at the medical facility flanked by a team of security guards. Her sister Kylie Jenner was no where to be seen. A photo posted by ROBERT KARDASHIAN (@robkardashian) on Oct 14, 2015 at 6:35pm PDT In related news, a source close to the family has claimed that Khloe is making medical decisions for Lamar since their divorce has not yet been finalized. "He never signed a living will, so Khloe is making decisions for him," the source told PEOPLE. "It's very stressful. She is lost."
